chmod 700 $HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi

chezmoi source-path
env WANT=$HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi
stdout ${WANT@R}

chezmoi source-path $HOME${/}.bashrc
env WANT=$HOME${/}.local${/}share${/}chezmoi${/}dot_bashrc
stdout ${WANT@R}

-- home/user/.local/share/chezmoi/dot_bashrc --
# contents of .bashrc
